website_summaries.verdict: Has more to offer when it comes to spaciousness than practicality; maneuverability in the sand can be a problem.
cons: The most common complaint: short handle makes it hard to maneuver
Difficult to pull in soft sand, and prone to tipping when making turns

customer_reviews.title: Worked for half a year, then wheels broke
customer_reviews.text: Previously gave 5 stars, but after only 7 months of use the wheels are breaking. It’s not working now, so sad.
customer_reviews.author: B H

customer_reviews.title: Horrific performance in sand.
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m going to assume the folks who wrote the positive reviews about this wagon on the beach actually in sand must NOT have been on a beach in Florida. We have real beaches with lots of sand here and this wagon did NOT perform as reviewed or advertised. All was well until we actually got to the beach and loose sand not packed sand. The front two wheels immediately quit turning and it had to be dragged by the back wheels through the sand. Not cool. Very disappointed. It’s a nice wagon- just don’t take it to a real beach.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not roll on sand
customer_reviews.text: Does not roll well on sand. Used one time and had to drag through beach sand, might as well purchased the thin wheeled cart and saved almost 50%. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to haul my equipment at matches. Surfaces are deep gravel in the bays with dirt paths between. Wagon is generously sized and the wheels roll easily on these surfaces. Construction is solid and wagon appears to be reasonably durable. My only complaint is that the belt used to secure the folded wagon prior to bagging is very short. Adding a couple of inches to same would make putting the wagon away much easier.
customer_reviews.author: churchlady

customer_reviews.title: Good beach wagon.
customer_reviews.text: Wagon worked well for the purpose that I ordered it. Took to beach and traveled very well on loose sand. Carried all of our gear back and forth with no problems. A little hard to steer on hard surfaces. No instructions for unfolding wagon came in the packaging. Instructions would have been nice to have as several different people used the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: peggydee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wagon, Sturdy, Great for every where
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. This wagon is solid sturdy comparing to any other products I found in stores. It is extremely well thought out. it is great for hauling heavy loads. The wheels move easily. the bottom has an extra padded cushion, my kid can comfortably ride in it. It folds easily and fit in our car. I can't wait for our next picnic to use it. I am writing to update my review for this wagon. It is still perfect after several use, works great, worth buy! recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Feifei

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR THE BEACH!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it is really easy to unpack my 7 year old did it a couple of times. Compact so did not take up to much space in my small car. CONS! I bought this specifically for the beach to roll easy over the sand with its wide wheels but that was a big flop!!! The wheels stop rolling as soon as we hit sand!!! we had to drag it the rest of the way... maybe if you are not loading up to much items then it might work better but other wise don't waste your money!!! Luckily we can use it for non-sand event as well...
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not too big. Very solid
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up/ break down. Everything comes well lubricated so the parts move very easily. I like that the "floor" is removable because it is mesh underneath, which means it will drain. Not too noisy on hard surfaces. It comes with a warning that it is not to be used to carry pets or children. My corgi loves it; he is why I bought it. Wheels have a rubber strip in the middle of the plastic, it would be nice if there were a little more rubber. Does not have any cup holders, tray or other features. It really is well made.
customer_reviews.author: paxpaz

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on vacation to OBX, the specific reason I purchased it. The sand was dry and it did not perform in any way described!! We had to remove most of what was in it--four beach chairs, a small cooler and towels and carry those items in addition to DRAGGING the wagon through that hot sand! It was beyond frustrating! I would NOT recommend buying this item. Perhaps look into one with inflatable tires, so one could let out air if necessary. This DID NOT work!
customer_reviews.author: GigisWave

customer_reviews.title: Nice useful cart with sturdy wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas to carry all his gear to his 4-H Shooting Sports classes. It's a really nice cart that can hold quite a bit of weight. The wide treads on the wheels are especially nice, and worth the extra money, I feel. He's had several people comment on this cart, and they always mention that it looks sturdier and the wheels are better than on the other ones they've seen. I think it was the right choice for the intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!! Take up very little space.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. After downsizing to a smaller home I found that I needed my old wheel barrel back. However in sticking to the “downsizing” mode, I decided on getting this tremendous space saver to haul things around my gardens. It works perfectly and has a store footprint of 7”x11”x30”. Don’t get me wrong folks, it isn’t as bomb proof as a wheel barrel, however when you’re in the “downsizing” mode, you quickly learn to improvise. Bottom line it is a well made sturdy calapsable wagon that works well with yard work.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelTK

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our beach routine!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than what we expected! The mesh bottom helps with reducing beach sand particles (unless your beach is shelly). it rolls great on harder surfaces (wet sand)... you will get a workout on the soft sand as you will more than likely be dragging it. But we love it! Saves us tons of effort from trying to carry it all!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great buggie for the beach! We were able to store multiple chairs and huge beach bag. Only downside to this on the beach is it does have difficulty with tackling the deeper sections of the dunes, which forces you to drag it across the beach. Works great outside of sand, folds up taking minimal space in a crossover. No pockets so things can get buried.
customer_reviews.author: Mjpeachy

customer_reviews.title: A handy tool! Solid construction!
customer_reviews.text: We're really happy with this wagon. It's super helpful how it folds up - makes it easy to take camping or to the beach. And then once you get there you don't have to carry everything by hand! We've used it to carry laundry a few times, too. Just don't let the kids sit in it (at least older/bigger ones - maybe small kids would be okay) - it's not that kind of wagon. The tires are quite big and sturdy and the fabric is thick. I predict we'll be using this wagon for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This cart works well - used it for many, many trips to the beach in Hawaii. Of course, pulling it in the sand is a bit harder than solid surfaces. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I wish the handle could be pulled out further - I'm 5'7", so a couple of inches would make pulling the cart even easier. The cart is easy to fold and easy to open - needs very little storage space.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and carries a lot. Big wheels help in rough terrain but still has trouble on sand if it's heavily loaded. We've used it for a full team's softball gear, carrying a load of fireworks and picnic gear to a block party, and for a 3/4 mile hike on a rough trail to a campground with tents, bags and food. It's handled everything well and made other campers jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine when we made it to the beach it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made but did not work to my expectations with our soft soft sand on the dune path to the beach on Nantucket. Needed wider wheels for ease of use in my case. Worked fine when we made it to the beach it was just that 35 yard to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide wheels are nice for sand.
customer_reviews.text: I was giddy about my purchase for our upcoming beach trip! Imagine my excitement to stroll through (insert big-name-retailer) three days after mine arrived, to find a more tricked out version of my wagon at a fraction of the price.... Oh well.....
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D. Autry

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this little wagon
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little wagon, I purchased it to carry all of my photography equipment to an event and it performed perfectly, It made it so much easier to get all of my gear to and from the event as parking was way down the street...The only issue I have with it is the way the handle moves about, it feels a bit awkward and stiff as it does not pull all the way down..this is the only reason for not giving it five stars...
customer_reviews.author: Reazo

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing I could have bought for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I could have bought for the beach. I rolls great on the sand with its big wheels, I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon. I have used it at the beach. It rolls fairly well on the sand of course not the super dry sand nothing goes on that but it did very nicely. I have taken it to the pool, drive in movies and car shows. Its wonderful. It pull it out pop it up and put the kids in and roll. My 3yr old naps in it often I love taking it for that reason. I can put toys to play with or food and not worry about the lids droping things. This is a must have for kids. Its much better than a stroller for any outdoor event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Best ever, worth the extra $$. This is so much better than the old one with the skinny wheels.
customer_reviews.author: F. K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Large, Folds Up Compact
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - sturdy, carries lots of stuff, folds up compact, rolls well over uneven terrain. Bought for an eclipse festival where we'd be camping about a half mile from the parking area. This was great to have rolling our camping gear across a field.
customer_reviews.author: MotoMannequin

customer_reviews.title: So practical!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and son-in-law after seeing them looking like pack mules just to take 2 small children to the beach! Now, at any outdoor event, they can just pack up the wagon, grab the baby and go! It's so easy and folds up to about the size of a pack and play. The cover keeps it clean between uses and compact enough to put it in the trunk. The large wheels are very effective in sand for beach days too. They love it. Going to the beach is a lot more fun now.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon with one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy cart is a bit larger than most folding wagons you see people use, which was great when lugging my gear at a festival. Went though mud and over tree roots like a champ. My only complaint, and the only reason I'm not giving it five stars, is the handle is a bit short. I'm 5' 11" and the front wheels kept hitting my heels when walking.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gatenby

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Investment
customer_reviews.text: We just took this for a week vacation at Gulf Shores. My husband toted two chairs, towels, water, a tent, and our 18-month old to and from the beach including a fair stretch of dry loose sand. He and I agree it would have been tough for me to manage, but he was able to pull it only getting a little out of breath lol. He definitely felt like it was a lot easier than trying to carry everything. Our main concern was that it wouldn’t be worth the investment, but it was.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagon for Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after going to the River in Nevada and trying to pull our items for the day through the sand. I love the wide wheels on this which makes getting through soft dirt or sand much easier. I've also used it for movie nights at the park in the summer and other day trips (I'm not really a camper). Great buy and great to have for even that occasional time I need a wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Benie's Buys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hard using wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Because I live on a sailboat I use this cart often and hard and I truly love it. I would rather the wheels be made of rubber but due to this being a beach wagon I do understand why it has plastic wheels, none the less I have used it hard and it has held up perfectly and many boaters have commented they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Not for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible on the beach. Back tires just drag because they are installed the wrong direction. And the handle is too short so it constantly hits your feet. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Melchner

customer_reviews.title: The best wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wagon I've ever used. It's really strong, even though it says it can take up to 150 lbs, I'm pretty sure I can handle even more. I was able to carry my big size dog along with bunch of tent stuff. But the best thing about this wagon is how smooth it is. The wheels are amazing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cem

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it's big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product does what I needed it to do however it's bulky and rather heavy not as convenient as some of the lighter weight models but then again it holds more weight. Great on packed Sand and Gravel not as good on soft sand when full. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sharon cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open & close
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot. Easy to open & close. Poor turning radius. Bigger wheels handle rougher ground well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wagon on big wheels
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one for a long time. I tested it out for the first time by putting 2 x24 packs of water and a 5 year old on it. It's easy to steer with those big wheels. I'm slightly worried on how long these wheels could last with constant heavy loads on the cargo, but they just look so good. The wagon is pretty sturdy cause I had to lift the end going up some steps - there was no creaking sound or anything. I can't wait to test it out on the sand when it's beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: can carrier lot of things.
customer_reviews.text: It can carrier lot of things, and is very easy to pull. if you have dog, you are dog will be happy to stay inside.
customer_reviews.author: charles kagan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beach but still hard to pull on dry sand
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon so far after one use. Great size and design. So easy to walk 6 blocks from the car to the beach on a sidewalk. Packed it with a cooler, chair, beach tent, towels, and our 10 month baby. He loved riding in it and it was deep enough that he wasn’t going to fall out. Steers well, just be careful with turning. Manageable on the dry sand and easier than others we saw with thinner wheels, but still requires a lot of strength. I couldn’t pull very well in flip flops in the sand. Needed my husband to pull because it was too heavy and the back wheels weren’t always turning which made it harder.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected. Great in sand!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and ended up buying this wagon. I wanted one for taking things to the beach and also for outdoor festivals and flea markets. The only thing that worried me, after reading reviews, was that the handle would be too short. I'm 6'2" and I thought that the wagon would be hitting my heels as I pulled it. Not at all. This wagon is amazing. Easy to set up and fold back up. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SharMack

customer_reviews.title: I love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon!!! Easy to fold up and unfold...fits easily in my vehicle (small SUV/crossover) and helps me haul my sewing equipment and supplies to and from all the sewing events I attend each month. I am VERY HAPPY with my purchase! I guess I should mention...the quality is excellent and the product arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to take out of the box. I love that it is easy to store in my trunk when not in use and to take out when I need to use it. It is sturdy; extremely well made. I have been using this for 2 months now and have only excellent things to say. I have used at a craft show to help transport items and also groceries from car to the house. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: a little pricey but has no major flaws that I have found. Unfolds in seconds. Easy to pull, even over rough terrain. Collapses back to storage configuration in less than 30 seconds. I would like to see a longer pull handle. The short handle makes you walk somewhat close to the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: SteveinKent

customer_reviews.title: This wagon is really great and will serve multiple purposes
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is really great and will serve multiple purposes! Right now though my kids are loving it. We have hauled them around at the zoo already. It has plenty of room for a 2 & 5 year old, plus our food for a picnic! The kids won't leave it, when we bring it in the house, they jump right in it with some pillows. We also intend to use this for work around the house. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Red wings

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for us
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, folds easily and can carry loads well. Bogs down some in loose sand but not too badly. Pulling handle is a bit short for tall people but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa F. Walker-Wyand

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach. Not “easy” because IT’S SAND, but SO MUCH BETTER than other ones at Sam’s and Costco that have smaller diameter and thinner wheels. Feels sturdy, too. Good case. Couldn’t ask for anything else at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: MScustomer

customer_reviews.title: This was a GREAT purchase! It folds up well but most importantly
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT purchase! It folds up well but most importantly, it was easy to navigate through the thick sand on the beach. Although it is compact when folded, we were able to put the entire wagon, loaded with beach stuff, right in the back of our Jeep Patriot. I cannot recommend this wagon strongly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for fluffy sand
customer_reviews.text: Bogs down immediately in light, fluffy sand which is disappointing because that's primarily why I bought it. Even with a light load it's like pulling a sled. Maybe it's ok for more compacted sand, I dont know. I do use it some around the house though and works great on any hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to open and close. Really hard to pull in the sand which I wasn’t expecting since I bought the wagon with bigger wheels
customer_reviews.author: John M. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great at the beach
customer_reviews.text: No wagon is going to be perfect at the beach especially in deep sand but this bad boy has saved my hubby from a lot of back breaking labor this summer. People are always in awe when they see us using this and all the crap we jam into it. Should be enjoying it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, easy to use. Handle height seems ok for me and I'm 5'9". We ordered this as a camping / beach wagon and so far have taken it camping without any issues. I really hope that it does well on the sand, but I guess time will see.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia

customer_reviews.title: Smart Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to open and close. Easy to turn and pull. We can use this for so many things.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Del Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wagon!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for fishing. But my daughter loves this wagon, she likes to put her dolls in it and pull the wagon, it folds up easy and compacts and has plenty of room for her and her toys. This wagon is really handy and the wheels goes to a lot of places. I’m so pleased with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not a tricycle
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are wide enough to help it roll on sand at the beach. The wheels on each corner was better to me than the tricycle style I had seen, more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Settle

customer_reviews.title: it wasn't enough of an issue for me to like this product any less
customer_reviews.text: I used this puppy at Rehoboth Beach, DE and with it loaded with two TimberRidge folding lawn chairs and other beach necessities and this wagon did traverse the sand without bogging. I expected to need a little more muscle to pull it through sand and it performed execellently on hard surfaces. If I have to find any con it would be the length of the handle; I wished it was alittle longer. However, it wasn't enough of an issue for me to like this product any less.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Twyman

customer_reviews.title: Wheels broken after one year of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had great reviews and was hoping it would last longer. It broke after one year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Thy

customer_reviews.title: So for I like the quality
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it for the beach yet...but seems great quality and it easy to open and close...I love that it comes with a removable cover when folded up for storage and traveling. Next week we will be going to a fam reunion outdoors...will use it to carry folded chairs and cooler...and make one trip from the vehicle for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: a great collapsible wagon with a great weight capacity. I am really impressed with this folding camping wagon/cart and have been using the daylights out of it, much more so than I anticipated when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike on the 45th Parallel in northern Michigan

customer_reviews.title: The wagon itself works okay, but the handle is ...
customer_reviews.text: The wagon itself works okay, but the handle is so awkward and doesn't come up high enough, so you're hunched over pulling it (even me, and I'm quite short). I really regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melzie

customer_reviews.title: Wanders A little But great!
customer_reviews.text: Received it fast and as it looks. Opened right up with no problems. The only thing I don't like about it is there is a lot of play in the handle. So as you are pulling it the wagon will wander from side to side. But other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total game changer for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. We've used it several times now. It holds our cooler, towels, beach blanket, boogie boards, and umbrella. We have to park about 1/4 mile from the water, so this makes the hike to and from the car a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Yikes

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used this yet. Just opened after receiving today. So far it is exactly as described, easy to maneuver, the tires are huge! I'm sure they'll be great in sand. Looks like it will hold everything we need for a beach day (umbrella, bags, toys, towels, change of clothes, snacks, drinks.....). Can't wait to use!
customer_reviews.author: L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Range Rover of utility wagons
customer_reviews.text: I thought this thing was awesome. Heavy but really sturdy with plenty of room. Definitely not your little garden wagon but suitable for hauling lot of camping/picnic/beach gear. Purchased as a gift but I did see it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect... but
customer_reviews.text: The wagon is great but the handle is not long enough and I am only 5'10". I have to slightly bend over to pull it which is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wagon. Carries more than you want to pull
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wagon. Carries more than you want to pull. All terrain wheels are sturdy and not shakey at all.Using it for groceries car to door. But will be great for planting, beach, everything.Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nikki l.

customer_reviews.title: Timber Ridge Folding Wagon/Cart
customer_reviews.text: We have a very large yard with lots of trees and this wagon comes in very handy. It is quite rugged and is great for when we pick up limbs off the property. This was a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great add for city living
customer_reviews.text: A perfect add for our condo life in a big city. We’re able to haul tons of items from the car to the unit without much hassle. It literally saves us the hassle of making multiple trips up and down hauling boxes, recycling, luggage, groceries, etc. It was particularly helpful in a recent move. Durable, relatively compact when collapsed, and easy to maneuver. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Everything else about this wagon is perfect, but this one problem is kind of a ...
customer_reviews.text: What's up with this handle??!! I ordered this wagon after much research... but I don't recall anything on this crazy short handle! It sticks out on the bottom and hits the wheels and for some odd reason doesn't extend as long as one would expect. Everything else about this wagon is perfect, but this one problem is kind of a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It came fully assembled and is easy to expand / collaspe
customer_reviews.text: It came fully assembled and is easy to expand / collaspe. We'll find out soon how well it rolls on a beach and how much it can carry.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holder

customer_reviews.title: Beach Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the beach and it was perfect to tow towels, toys and kids to and from the beach. Worked well even through sand with the large wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great multi use product
customer_reviews.text: This cart is being used for my Interior Design Staging business and we love it! Its super heavy duty and easy to maneuver. It is also great to have for everyday tasks outdoors and helping with groceries!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH MONICAL

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon that fits my needs quite well. Sturdy and a decent size. A little clumsy but it’s not too hard to manipulate
customer_reviews.author: gail b

customer_reviews.title: Easy open and close
customer_reviews.text: Went easily from beach to boardwalk. Pulled 2, 40lb children with ease. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: WifeNMom

customer_reviews.title: Great cart! We have to carry cases of water ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! We have to carry cases of water and groceries from the driveway to the house. This cart really makes our day so much better. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PastorJerry

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases ever. I have used this more times than I would of ever thought. My friends have borrowed it and even my Grandchildren love it! I don't know how I have lived without this before!!
customer_reviews.author: Myrooo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We live by the beach my wife and kid going to the beach ones to two times. We love it. It’s make life so much better And you can use it anywhere. For the bad comments you do need to pull it :). Really good product
customer_reviews.author: avner tamari

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon. Very sturdy. If you are shorter it is a little easier to pull. Folds up so nicely and fits in a corner out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: mjwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great for hauling all my stuff from the parking lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for hauling all my stuff from the parking lot to the firing line at my local range ! Supported all my gear and ammo and guns and was easy to pull across the grassy terrain .
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Caliendo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wide wheels are great to haul all our gear to the beach through the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Best wagon, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wagon!! I was getting compliments at the picnic grounds all day long. Its deep enough to hold a lot of things and the big wheels roll over ANYTHING. It folds up so neatly after use for storage. My only issue with this is that the handle to pull it is a little short but other than that, this is a good product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We use it almost every weekend at ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We use it almost every weekend at our grandsons's baseball games.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: But it works great for hauling groceries up my home's ramp
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for traveling so I can eliminate the bother of using luggage racks. But it works great for hauling groceries up my home's ramp. It's sturdy and capable of holding large & heavy loads. It folds up nicely so it doesn't take up too much space in my small model hatchback. Glad I bought it. A bit pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!  You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful with the big wheels! Used for the Senior Games. Made our lives so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Svillepk

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled when we found this foldable wagon as we couldn't fit one more "baby item" in our car. Great for hauling things around the yard, toys at the beach, kids, etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! Easily unfolded and re folded. Took it to the beach. Much better than carrying everything. Wouldn't roll in loose sand, but that was to be expected. Otherwise rolled fine. Seems well made so far, substantial. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon& cart and it's foldable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wagon. We were looking for a foldable wagon& cart for a long time. And we finally found a perfect one. It's very useful. The Wagon it self was durable and sturdy it was easy to clean as well. It was easy to fold as well and fits just perfect to my shed when i'm not using it. Great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. In deep sand and a heavy load front wheels tend to bury themselves making it difficult. So be aware on your intentions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Light but strong and super useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this wagon. It was great for our beach vacations and for pulling my daughter around on our hilly property. It's fairly compact. I liked it so much that I bought one for work for when I do school programs or fairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for off road maneuvering
customer_reviews.text: Great rugged wagon, can go off the sidewalk fine. The only flaw I see if the inability to extend the handle longer or shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for ranch
customer_reviews.text: Use this for moving hay around the ranch. The plastic wheels are perfect for our hard rock terrain and the fact the wagon can collapse is perfect for storing it in the horse trailer for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: This foldung wagon is great. My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This foldung wagon is great. My grandson loves it. Takes to brothers football games, the county fairs. Folds up so can take in car.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but Wal-Mart has same one half price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but Wal-Mart has same one half price. I bought from each and compared. Funny but happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: gary gordon

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEACH BUGGY
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BEACH BUGGY....It folds up to a very small size...Folds out and has a floor that allows you to carry everything on the sand...Best Beach Buggy out there...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cates

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon. Folds compactly and easily and unfolds simply for use. Really great design. Nice long handle. Easy to pull. Holds a lot. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Betzd

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my back! I must haul groceries from a too-distant, bumpy parking lot into an apartment building. This cart is up to the task every time!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Great wheels for plowing through the sand at the beach! Nicest wagon I’ve ever seen On the beach. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jb06

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: So easy to fold and pack. Easy to open and fill. Great turning radius. Handles great on the sand
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wagon! It was easy to put together. We use this around the house and take it camping with us. The large wheels make it easy to navigate and the adjustable handle makes it easy for my much taller husband to use also. It's very sturdy, my kids get into it and pull each other around. I would certainly recommend this wagon to anybody
customer_reviews.author: George J.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: How did I survive all those years without this? It's literally the best beach item I've every purchased. The wheels are great for the sand!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic88

customer_reviews.title: Great for hauling what one needs down to the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my new wagon. I ordered it to use at the beach and camping as well. It folds up neatly and is easy to store. The tires travel well over rough terrain. It is large enough to carry all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and just adorable for beach outings... The wide wheels do great in the sand. Easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stable and easy to turn
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this to move items from the house to the trailer. Extremely stable and easy to turn. I had no issues taking it over the two inch drop through the entry way. There was a sharp turn between a wall and rock. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wagon! We use it weekly to bring groceries in the house. But of course we use it for beach trips too! So many uses!
customer_reviews.author: LAAJ

customer_reviews.title: nice wagon
customer_reviews.text: love it,give it as a christmas gift for my kids. can go very smoothly, the wheel is wide enough to work on the beach. It can pack in a small size,good for the family who has small car.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lyu

product_meta.title: Timber Ridge Folding Camping Wagon/Cart - Collapsible Sturdy Steel Frame Garden/Beach Wagon/Cart
feature_bullets: WEIGHT CAPACITY: Supports up to 150lbs on hard surface and 110lbs on sand or beach. 8" diameter large wheels with rubber tape at middle is suitable for all terrains, while 3.3"extra wheel width more suitable for beach. Stable and allows for convenient transport of your equipment and gear
DIMENSIONS: 35.5"Lx18.4"Wx12"H. Handle length: 26". Ground to the top of the handle:35", PACKAGE DIMENSIONS: 30"x16.5"x8.5". Easily folds into and transported with included carry bag

INSTANT AND EASY SET UP: Push the bottom and you can open the utility wagon in one second! No assembly required.. Since the folding method of the cart is to be bundled into a bundle, the fabric of the cart may have wrinkles. We recommend fill the cart with goods and will flatten the cart fabric

FRONT WHEELS rotate while back wheels are fixed; Telescoping handle provides easy control on most terrain. The wagon cart is perfect for transporting shopping, on family outings or as a goods trolley, and great for trips to the garden, park, camping, outdoor sporting events, or carry grocery

1-YEAR MANUFACTURE'S WARRANTY: We back our products with a full 1 year manufacturers warranty against any defective workmanship and material. We offer industry leading customer service on all of our products. Tie-in Stadium Seat, please search ASIN B077MDVM8L
